description:
Take the weight off your shoulders and pop it on your rack. Whether you are a die hard commuter, tourer, or just love rolling around on 2-wheels, the Transit Tubular rack will help you schlep your gear from A-to-B.

  • 6061 aluminum with stainless steel hardware
  • Fits wheel sizes 26 inch up to 700c, with fenders
  • Large platform works well with trunk bags, baskets, and other top-loading storage
  • 28cm extension arms fit even the smallest bikes, and can be bent to shape without compromising strength, due to their bridged construction
  • Includes mounting hardware
name: Axiom Transit Tubular Rack
